attributes.action: Fenland District Council should spend money redeveloping Whittlesey, Cambridgeshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fenland District Council are in charge of Wisbech, March, Chatteris and Whittlesey. I believe that hardly any money or attention is being aimed towards Whittlesey. The petition is also to get the district council to allow a supermarket to be built on the outskirts as Whittlesey is in need of this sort of amenities.

rejection.details: Please contact your council with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
